title: Unable to purchase RP - getting a white screen
body:
So im trying to spend my hard earnt cash on this addictive, full of toxic, amazingly wonderful game. Yet I get a white screen with this text:"https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lpEeMLdB-client-not-letting-me-purchase-rp" 

I'm in OCE, nsw specifically, using the OCE client - any ideas? so depressed rn i could be buying drugs but no i choose RP...

replies.body: Over 200+ views and no replies but myself {{item:3151}}  ill go fuck myself
Now i'm getting this: Failed to load URL "https://plstore.oc1.lol.riotgames.com/session/new/" with error "ERR_CONNECTION_TIMED_OUT" (-118). "
